name: esformatter-jsx
description: esformatter plugin: format javascript files that contain React JSX blocks

scripts.watch: npm run cover && watch-spawn -p 'specs/**/*.spec.js' -p 'index.js' -p  npm run cover
scripts.lint: npm run beautify && npm run eslint && npm test
scripts.check: npm run beautify-check && npm run eslint && npm test
scripts.do-changelog: npm run changelog && git add ./changelog.md && git commit -m 'DOC: Generate changelog'
